About Me

Please allow me to introduce myself.

Biography:

I’m Travis Ryan. My background is in Business and Computer Science. I’m an entrepreneur, consultant, and full stack software engineer specializing in JavaScript and Node.js. I have a proven ability to understand and translate business requirements into development architecture, ensuring the product you want is built on time and on budget.

My Technical Values

I love making things that make a difference!

  • Responsive layouts work on any device, large or small.
  • Fast load times and a lag free user experience.
  • Strong penchant for clean and intuitive user interfaces.
  • Honest and effective communication throughout the development process ensures the features that move the needle for your business are prioritized and optimized.
